Talks Between Lord Siva and Sati&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;4/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;4.&lt;/strong&gt; Sati Quits Her Body&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;5/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;5.&lt;/strong&gt; Frustration of the Sacrifice of Daksa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;6/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;6.&lt;/strong&gt; Brahma Satisfies Lord Siva&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;7/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;7.&lt;/strong&gt; The Sacrifice Performed by Daksa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;8/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;8.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja Leaves Home for the Forest&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;9/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;9.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja Returns Home&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja’s Fight With the Yaksas&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; Svayambhuva Manu Advises Dhruva Maharaja to Stop Fighting&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; Dhruva Maharaja Goes Back to Godhead&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; Description of the Descendants of Dhruva Maharaja&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; The Story of King Vena&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; King Prthu’s Appearance and Coronation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; Praise of King Prthu by the Professional Reciters&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; Maharaja Prthu Becomes Angry at the Earth&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; Prthu Maharaja Milks the Earth Planet&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; King Prthu’s One Hundred Horse Sacrifices&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Visnu’s Appearance in the Sacrificial Arena of Maharaja Prthu&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; Instructions by Maharaja Prthu&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; Prthu Maharaja’s Meeting with the Four Kumaras&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; Maharaja Prthu’s Going Back Home&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; Chanting the Song Sung by Lord Siva&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descriptions of the Characteristics of King Puranjana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; King Puranjana Goes to the Forest to Hunt, and His Queen Becomes Angry&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;27/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;27.&lt;/strong&gt; Attack by Candavega on the City of King Puranjana; the Character of Kalakanya&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;28/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt; Puranjana Becomes a Woman in the Next Life&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;29/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;29.&lt;/strong&gt; Talks Between Narada and King Pracinabarhi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;30.&lt;/strong&gt; The Activities of the Pracetas&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;31/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;31.&lt;/strong&gt; Narada Instructs the Pracetas&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fourth Canto - The Creation of the Fourth Order&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

Understanding Material Nature&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;28/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Kapila’s Instructions on the Execution of Devotional Service&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;29/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;29.&lt;/strong&gt; Explanation of Devotional Service by Lord Kapila&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;30.&lt;/strong&gt; Description by Lord Kapila of Adverse Fruitive Activities&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;31/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;31.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Kapila’s Instructions on the Movements of the Living Entities&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;32/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;32.&lt;/strong&gt; Entanglement in Fruitive Activities&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;33/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;33.&lt;/strong&gt; Activities of Kapila&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Third Canto - The Status Quo&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');

link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - First Canto - Creation 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;First Canto - Creation&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

The Downfall of Saubhari Muni&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descendants of King Mandhata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; The Sons of Sagara Meet Lord Kapiladeva&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Amsuman&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; The Pastimes of the Supreme Lord, Ramacandra&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Ramacandra Rules the World&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Kusa, the Son of Lord Ramacandra&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Maharaja Nimi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;27/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;27.&lt;/strong&gt; King Pururava Enchanted by Urvasi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;28/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;28.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;29/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;29.&lt;/strong&gt; Parasurama, the Lord’s Warrior Incarnation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;30.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;31/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;31.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Parasurama Destroys the World’s Ruling Class&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;32/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;32.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;33/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;33.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasties of the Sons of Pururava&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;34/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;34.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;35/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;35.&lt;/strong&gt; King Yayati Regains His Youth&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;36/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;36.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;37/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;37.&lt;/strong&gt;             &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Ninth Canto - Liberation&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

Bali Mahārāja Conquers the Heavenly Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;30/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;30.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;31/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;31.&lt;/strong&gt; Executing the Payo-vrata Process of Worship&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;32/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;32.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;33/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;33.&lt;/strong&gt; The Supreme Lord Agrees to Become Aditi’s Son&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;34/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;34.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;35/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;35.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Vamanadeva, the Dwarf Incarnation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;36/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;36.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;37/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;37.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Vamanadeva Begs Charity from Bali Maharaja&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;38/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;38.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;39/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;39.&lt;/strong&gt; Bali Maharaja Surrenders the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;40/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;40.&lt;/strong&gt; Summary&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;41/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;41.&lt;/strong&gt;                 &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Eighth Canto - Withdrawal of the Cosmic Creations&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Seventh Canto - The Science of God&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Sixth Canto - Prescribed Duties for Mankind&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impetus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Fourth Canto - The Creation of the Fourth Order 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fourth Canto - The Creation of the Fourth Order&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Third Canto - The Status Quo

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;
&lt;ol class=&quot;chapter&quot;&gt;&lt;li class=&quot;affix&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;../../index.html&quot; class=&quot;active&quot;&gt;Home&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li class=&quot;affix&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;index.html&quot;&gt;Table of Contents&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;1/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/strong&gt; Questions by Vidura&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;2/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/strong&gt; Remembrance of Lord Krsna&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;3/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;3.&lt;/strong&gt; &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Third Canto - The Status Quo&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Second Canto - The Cosmic Manifestation&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;h1&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;a class=&amp;amp;quot;header&amp;amp;quot; href=&amp;amp;quot;#home&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;home&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Home&amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;lt;nav class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;nav-wrapper&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Page navigation&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;lt;!-- Mobile navigation buttons --&amp;amp;amp;gt;



    &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a rel=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;next&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;index.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;mobile-nav-chapters next&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Right&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-angle-right&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div style=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;clear: both&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/nav&amp;amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;lt;a rel=&amp;quot;next&amp;quot; href=&amp;quot;index.html&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;mobile-nav-chapters next&amp;quot; title=&amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;quot;Right&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

&lt;!-- Custom JS scripts --&gt;



</body>


                </main>

            &lt;nav class=&quot;nav-wrapper&quot; aria-label=&quot;Page navigation&quot;&gt;

                &amp;lt;a rel=&amp;quot;next&amp;quot; href=&amp;quot;index.html&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;mobile-nav-chapters next&amp;quot; title=&amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;quot;Right&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

                </main>

            &lt;nav class=&quot;nav-wrapper&quot; aria-label=&quot;Page navigation&quot;&gt;
                &lt;!-- Mobile navigation buttons --&gt;

                &amp;lt;a rel=&amp;quot;next&amp;quot; href=&amp;quot;index.html&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;mobile-nav-chapters next&amp;quot; title=&amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Next chapter&amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;quot;Right&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

Table of Contents

  1. King Sudyumna Becomes a Woman

  2. The Dynasties of the Sons of Manu

  3. The Marriage of Sukanya and Cyavana Muni

  4. Ambarisa Maharaja Offended by Durvasa Muni

  5. Durvasa Muni’s Life Spared

  6. The Downfall of Saubhari Muni

  7. The Descendants of King Mandhata

  8. The Sons of Sagara Meet Lord Kapiladeva

  9. The Dynasty of Amsuman

  10. The Pastimes of the Supreme Lord, Ramacandra

  11. Lord Ramacandra Rules the World

  12. The Dynasty of Kusa, the Son of Lord Ramacandra

  13. The Dynasty of Maharaja Nimi

  14. King Pururava Enchanted by Urvasi

  15. Parasurama, the Lord’s Warrior Incarnation

  16. Lord Parasurama Destroys the World’s Ruling Class

  17. The Dynasties of the Sons of Pururava

  18. King Yayati Regains His Youth

  19. King Yayati Achieves Liberation

  20. The Dynasty of Puru

  21. The Dynasty of Bharata

  22. The Descendants of Ajamidha

  23. The Dynasties of the Sons of Yayati

  24. Krsna, the Supreme Personality of Godhead
